Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Central
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute near 119th/Morgan
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Morgan.

Westbound buses will operate via 119th, Halsted, 115th, Marshfield, 119th, over normal route.

Eastbound buses will operate via 119th, Ashland, 115th, Halsted, 119th, over normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
